DOC.criteria: Healthy free clinically significant illness disease Male female subject age 18 55 year elderly male subject age ≥65 A body weight ≥60 kg male ≥50 kg female , body mass index range 18 30 kg/m2 Participated three clinical study involve administration IMP previous year , study within 12 week Clinically significant endocrine , thyroid , hepatic , respiratory , gastro intestinal , renal , cardiovascular skin disease , history significant psychiatric/psychotic illness disorder Clinically relevant abnormal medical history , physical finding laboratory value
